trans-unit.source: Contains instance information about a single instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações de instância sobre uma instância única de uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> is a single run-time instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> uma única instância de tempo de execução de um <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it describes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects that are attached to a single binding target property, which receives its value from the first <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object in the collection that returns a value successfully.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, ela descreve uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objetos que estão anexados a uma propriedade de destino de associação simples, que recebe o valor do primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objeto da coleção que retorna um valor com êxito.

trans-unit.source: For information about binding expressions, see the Binding and BindingExpression section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre expressões de associação, consulte a seção de associação e BindingExpression no [visão geral de associação de dados](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> based on priority.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de associação determina qual o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objetos é o <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> com base na prioridade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> ativo.

trans-unit.source: The active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object; or <see langword="null" />, if no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object is active.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> ativo; ou <see langword="null" /> se nenhum objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> estiver ativo.

trans-unit.source: Although the return type is <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" />, the returned object is only a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> object because the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> class currently supports only <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Embora o tipo de retorno seja <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" />, o objeto retornado é apenas um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> porque, no momento, a classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> dá suporte apenas a objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> based on priority.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de associação determina qual o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objetos é o <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> com base na prioridade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> objects inside this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> dentro dessa instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Although the return type is a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" /> objects, the returned collection only contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> objects because the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> class currently supports only <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Embora o tipo de retorno é uma coleção de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase" /> objetos, a coleção retornada contém somente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> objetos porque o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> classe atualmente suporta apenas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the parent binding has a failed validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a associação pai tem uma regra de validação com falha.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parent binding has a failed validation rule; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o pai de associação tem uma regra de validação com falha; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> object from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> do qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> object from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding" /> objeto do qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression" /> é criado.

trans-unit.source: Updates the source on the active binding.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a origem na associação ativa.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Updates the target on the active binding.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o destino na associação ativa.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateTarget%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateTarget%2A> método sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> propriedade.
